Class EventCenter

java.lang.Object

public class EventCenter
extends java.lang.Object

Keeps track of all registered events

Author:
Phil Brown

Method Detail

bind

public static void bind(java.lang.String trigger,
                        Function function,
                        java.lang.Object scope)
Bind a function to the name of a trigger for the given scope

Parameters:
trigger - the event name
function - the function to invoke
scope - the scope. Use null for global scope.

unbind

public static void unbind(java.lang.String trigger,
                          Function function,
                          java.lang.Object scope)
Unbind a function for the given event trigger and scope

Parameters:
trigger - the name of the event
function - the function to remove
scope - the scope of the bound event

trigger

public static void trigger(java.lang.String text,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> args,
                           java.lang.Object scope)
Trigger an event. Note that the droidQuery function parameter will be null.

Parameters:
text - the name of the event
args - the arguments to pass to the registered functions
scope - the scope of the event

trigger

public static void trigger($ droidQuery,
                           java.lang.String text,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> args,
                           java.lang.Object scope)
Trigger an event.

Parameters:
droidQuery - the instance of droidQuery to pass as a parameter
text - the name of the event
args - the arguments to pass to the registered functions
scope - the scope of the event
